scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm start --prefix client"
scripts.deploy:web: npm run build && npm run start:prod
scripts.start:https: cd server && set HTTPS_PORT=5443 && npm start
scripts.init:capacitor: cd client && npx cap init CipherVault com.ciphervault.app
scripts.add:android: cd client && npx cap add android
scripts.add:ios: cd client && npx cap add ios
scripts.build:android: cd client && npm run build && npx cap copy android && npx cap sync android
scripts.build:ios: cd client && npm run build && npx cap copy ios && npx cap sync ios
scripts.open:android: cd client && npx cap open android
scripts.open:ios: cd client && npx cap open ios
scripts.commit:deploy: git add . && git commit -m "Production deployment ready" && git push origin main
